The 'Rule of 40' is typically calculated by combining the growth rate + operating margin to showcase a profitability adjusted growth metric.

The PEG ratio compares a company‚Äôs P/E multiple to its expected earnings CAGR, typically over the next 3 years so it adjusts valuation for how fast the business is actually growing.

Five names the market threw into the ‚Äúmoat-vulnerable‚Äù bucket that are now wildly undervalued:

1. $DUOL at 18x FCF w/ a Rule-of-40 score of 70
2. $ADBE at 14x FCF w/ a Rule-of-40 score of 49
3. $MNDY at 20x FCF w/ a Rule-of-40 score of 53
4. $HIMS growing 59% w/ 13% EBITDA margins at just 24x EBITDA
5. $PYPL trading at a 0.7 PEG on the next three years of earnings

The market is pricing these like their moats already collapsed but if any of them prove their moats still hold in the new digital economy then the rerate will be explosive.

$AMZN subscription machine is a ~$50B business compounding over 30% a year for a decade.

When a product becomes life infrastructure then you can raise prices without losing customers.

That‚Äôs real pricing power.

The Signal measures these patterns across multiple dimensions (Price, Volume, Volatility) simultaneously.

Microsoft $MSFT CEO Satya Nadella said last weekend that the tech giant is bringing online more than 100,000 $NVDA GB300s this quarter alone for inference workloads across its fleet.

Microsoft $MSFT has unveiled its second Fairwater data center in Atlanta, part of its strategy to build an AI supercomputer capable of serving any workload anywhere. 

Microsoft says Fairwater ‚Äúcan integrate hundreds of thousands of the latest Nvidia $NVDA GB200 and GB300 GPUs into a massive supercomputer‚Äù using a single flat network.

STOP STEALING MY SHIT JEFFREY GUNDLACH

It‚Äôs okay to be vulnerable.

It‚Äôs how you develop relationships.

Someone has to be vulnerable in a relationship to form a relationship.

I‚Äôm publicly vulnerable, and that‚Äôs why I have an incredibly huge network of friends and industry contacts.

Be human.

Be kind.

Be you.

I don‚Äôt attack others unless they attack me.

I try to keep things sarcastic, fun, engaging, thought provoking, and loud.

If you want to attack an argument, you can do so without attacking the person and being an asshole.

Few understand this.

Almost as embarrassing as your ability to distinguish between your and you‚Äôre.

For a guy with an American flag in your profile, you might want to learn sentence structure, spelling, and the English language.

It‚Äôs a tell that I‚Äôm a damn hard worker who sacrificed over 900 hours to accomplish something with a level of discipline you will never understand.

Fuck off.

I‚Äôm wrong all the time.

And anyone who isn‚Äôt on X is a fraud.

No one knows what tomorrow brings.

Identify conditions, probabilities, and keep rolling the die.
